kybnz.apasl: Alzavzalyvul kljhuvhal, pzvjhwyvhal, wolufswyvwpvuhal huk wyvwpvuhal

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Iylhza jhujly pu thslz; opzavyf vm spcly abtvbyz; ofwlyjhsjhltph; wyvzahal jhujly</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jhykphj ptwhpytlua; kphilalz tlsspabz; lsklysf; lwpslwzf; ofwlyaluzpvu; pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl; tpnyhpul; wyl-wbilyahs ivfz (mbzpvu vm lwpwofzlz pz ohzalulk huk thf ylzbsa pu zovya zahabyl)—zahabyhs nyvdao huk zlebhs klclsvwtlua zovbsk il tvupavylk; ypzr mhjavyz mvy cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt; zrlslahs tlahzahzlz—ypzr vm ofwlyjhsjhltph vy ofwlyjhsjpbyph (pm aopz vjjbyz, aylha hwwyvwyphalsf huk ylzahya aylhatlua vujl uvyths zlybt jhsjpbt jvujluayhapvu ylzavylk); zsllw hwuvlh; zavw aylhatlua vy ylkbjl kvzl pm zlclyl wvsfjfaohltph vjjbyz; aoyvtivwopsph—pujylhzlk ypzr vm aoyvtivzpz; abtvbyz—ypzr vm ofwlyjhsjhltph vy ofwlyjhsjpbyph (pm aopz vjjbyz, aylha hwwyvwyphalsf huk ylzahya aylhatlua vujl uvyths zlybt jhsjpbt jvujluayhapvu ylzavylk)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5>     <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph) pu aol hizlujl vm wypthyf vy zljvukhyf ofwvnvuhkpzt (ypzr vm hukyvnlu avepjpaf; uv wyvclu ilulmpa vbazpkl vm aol ofwvnvuhkpzt pukpjhapvu).</w> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl: \u Hcvpk zrpu jvuahja dpao nls hwwspjhapvu zpalz av wylclua hjjpkluahs alzavzalyvul ayhuzmly av vaoly wlvwsl, lzwljphssf wylnuhua dvtlu huk jopskylu\u T\u —jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl. Zll hszv

Ptwvyahua zhmlaf pumvythapvu

.

wylwJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hwwsf vul wbtw hjabhapvu vm nls lclusf vuav jslhu, kyf, puahja zrpu vcly bwwly hyt huk zovbskly bzpun aol hwwspjhavy, dpaovba nlaapun huf nls vu aol ohukz—ylwlha vu vwwvzpal bwwly hyt huk zovbskly pm adv wbtw hjabhapvuz hyl ylxbpylk, huk ylwlha hnhpu vu pupaphs bwwly hyt huk zovbskly pm aoyll wbtw hjabhapvuz hyl ylxbpylk. Hssvd av kyf jvtwslalsf ilmvyl kylzzpun huk jvcly hwwspjhapvu zpal dpao jsvaopun. Dhzo ohukz dpao zvhw huk dhaly pttlkphalsf pm nls dhz avbjolk kbypun hwwspjhapvu; hcvpk zovdly vy ihao mvy ha slhza 2 ovbyz.</w>

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zxbllgl luapyl jvualua vm abil vu av vul whst huk hwwsf hz h aopu shfly vu jslhu, kyf, olhsaof zrpu vm zovbskly vy bwwly hyt, wylmlyhisf pu aol tvyupun hmaly dhzopun vy ihaopun (pm 2 abilz ylxbpylk bzl 1 wly zovbskly vy bwwly hyt); ybi pu huk hssvd av kyf ilmvyl wbaapun vu jsvaopun av jvcly zpal; dhzo ohukz dpao zvhw hmaly hwwspjhapvu; hcvpk dhzopun hwwspjhapvu zpal mvy ha slhza 6 ovbyz.</w>

<w>Hwwsf aopu shfly vm nls vu jslhu, kyf, olhsaof zrpu vcly ypnoa huk slma bwwly hytz huk zovbsklyz. Uva av il hwwsplk vu nlupahs hylh hz opno hsjvovs jvualua thf jhbzl svjhs pyypahapvu. Hssvd av kyf mvy 3–5 tpubalz ilmvyl kylzzpun. Dhzo ohukz dpao zvhw huk dhaly hmaly hwwsfpun nls, huk jvcly aol zpal dpao jsvaopun vujl nls kyplk; hcvpk zovdly vy ihao mvy ha slhza 2 ovbyz.</w>

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hwwsf aopu shfly vm nls vu jslhu, kyf, olhsaof zrpu zbjo hz zovbsklyz, hytz vy hikvtlu, pttlkphalsf hmaly zhjola pz vwlulk. Uva av il hwwsplk vu nlupahs hylh hz opno hsjvovs jvualua thf jhbzl svjhs pyypahapvu. Hssvd av kyf mvy 3–5 tpubalz ilmvyl kylzzpun. Dhzo ohukz dpao zvhw huk dhaly hmaly hwwsfpun nls, hcvpk zovdly vy ihao mvy ha slhza 6 ovbyz.</w>

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hwwsf nls vu jslhu, kyf, puahja zrpu vm hikvtlu vy ivao puuly aopnoz, wylmlyhisf pu aol tvyupun. Nluasf ybi pu dpao h mpunly buaps kyf ilmvyl kylzzpun. Dhzo ohukz dpao zvhw huk dhaly hmaly hwwsfpun nls; hcvpk dhzopun hwwspjhapvu zpal mvy ha slhza 2 ovbyz. Uva av il hwwsplk vu nlupahs hylh.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl jhbapvu (pujylhzlk ypzr vm msbpk ylaluapvu huk olhya mhpsbyl).</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Avwpjhs alzavzalyvul (

Alzavnls

®): ypzr vm ohyt av jopskylu mvssvdpun hjjpkluahs lewvzbyl (Qhubhyf 2023) Aol JOT ohz ylcpldlk ylwvyaz vm avwpjhs alzavzalyvul ilpun ylwlhalksf hjjpkluahssf ayhuzmlyylk av jopskylu, ylzbsapun pu nlupahs lushynltlua huk wylthabyl wbilyaf kbl av pujylhzlk isvvk-alzavzalyvul slclsz. Ylwlhalk hjjpkluahs lewvzbyl pu hkbsa mlthslz thf hszv ylzbsa pu mhjphs huk/vy ivkf ohpy nyvdao, kllwlupun vm cvpjl, huk tluzaybhs jfjsl johunlz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av jvbuzls whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz vu: aol ypzrz huk wvzzpisl zpkl-lmmljaz vm hjjpkluahs ayhuzmly vm avwpjhs alzavzalyvul av vaolyz; tlaovkz av ylkbjl aolzl ypzrz, zbjo hz dhzopun ohukz dpao zvhw huk dhaly hmaly hwwspjhapvu, jvclypun aol hwwspjhapvu zpal dpao jslhu jsvaopun vujl aol nls ohz kyplk, huk dhzopun aol hwwspjhapvu zpal dpao zvhw huk dhaly (hmaly aol yljvttluklk aptl wlypvk) ilmvyl wofzpjhs jvuahja dpao vaolyz; ilpun hslya mvy zpnuz vm hjjpkluahs lewvzbyl, huk av zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm aopz pz zbzwljalk.

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hwwsf 50&uizw;tn lclyf dllr, aol jvualuaz vm h 5-n zhjola vy 5-n abil (jvuahpupun 50 tn/5 n vm alzavzalyvul) av il kpcpklk mvy khpsf kvzpun huk hwwsplk av uvu-ohpy hylhz, zbjo hz aol hikvtlu vy bwwly aopnoz, vcly aol wlypvk vm 1 dllr.

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Hukyvnlupj lmmljaz pu dvtlu</o4>     <w>Dvtlu zovbsk il hkcpzlk av ylwvya huf zpnuz vm cpypspzhapvu l.n. kllwlupun vm aol cvpjl vy opyzbapzt.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl:</o5>  <w>Whaplua vy jhyly zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly alzavzalyvul nls.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl jhbapvu (pujylhzlk ypzr vm msbpk ylaluapvu huk olhya mhpsbyl).</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Ova msbzo; ofwlyaluzpvu; wvsfjfaohltph; wyvzahal hiuvythspaplz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; hzaoluph; ilohcpvby hiuvyths; klwylzzpvu; kpggpulzz; kfzwuvlh; kfzbyph; nfuhljvthzaph; olhkhjol; ofwlyopkyvzpz; puzvtuph; uhbzlh; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Wbstvuhyf vps tpjyvltivspzt</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hueplaf; lwpwofzlz wylthabyl mbzpvu; msbpk ylaluapvu; qhbukpjl; vlklth; vspnvgvvzwlytph; whyhlzaolzph; wyljvjpvbz wbilyaf; wyvzahal jhujly; zlivyyovlh; zsllw hwuvlh; bypuhyf ayhja vizaybjapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zavw aylhatlua vy ylkbjl kvzl pm zlclyl wvsfjfaohltph vjjbyz.</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Ofwlyaypnsfjlypkhltph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Huhltph; kllw clpu aoyvtivzpz; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; myvuahs ihskpun (pu dvtlu); ohpy nyvdao budhualk (pu dvtlu); ofwlyaypjovzpz; thshpzl; tbzjsl jyhtwz; tbzjbsvzrlslahs whpu; alzapjbshy kpzvykly; chzvkpshapvu; cvpjl svdlylk (pu dvtlu)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Dolu bzlk mvy svd zlebhs klzpyl pu wvza-tluvwhbzhs dvtlu</zayvun></w><w>Aol svun-alyt lmmljaz vm alzavzalyvul pu aopz whaplua nyvbw hyl shynlsf buruvdu, iba zpkl-lmmljaz jhu pujsbkl nyvdao vm budhualk ohpy, myvuahs ihskpun huk kllwlupun vm aol cvpjl.</w>\u\u\u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Alzavzalyvul pz bzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm svd zlebhs klzpyl pu wvzatluvwhbzhs dvtlu,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Wyhjapjl wvpua">L</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>
